name: Mic's masks
description:
EXPLORE A WORLD THAT RESETS EVERY MINUTE
FIND MASKS AND UNLEASH THEIR POWER

CONTROLS

Z / gamepad A: jump

UP & DOWN: toggle masks

This was my FCJAM3 entry and my first TIC-80 game! 

It's an unfinished prototype.

I'm currently developing a post-jam version - see my twitter how it's doing right now!

Uh, anyone have a better name for this...?
